pages.text: 23|28|neowa geuligo neowa hamkke han jaga baeleul tamyeonseo joejieun baegseongdeullobuteo jeohuileul guwonhayeo jusin hananimkkemodeun yeong-gwang-eul deulilago malhala
23|29|juyeo chugbogbad-eun ttang-e ileuge hayeo jusoseo dangsin-iyamallo geuleoh ge hal su issneun gajang hullyunghan bun-i siobnida
23|30|sillo geu an-eneun yejeung-i iss-eoss eumyeo ulineun i malsseum-eulo geudeul-eulsiheomhaessnola
23|31|geu huedo hananim-eun geudeul i hu tto daleun sedaeleul sewossnola
23|32|geudeul gaondee han yeeonjaleul bonaeeoss-euni ineun neohuiga hanbun bakk e eobsneun hananim-eul gyeongbaetolog ham-i la neohuineun dulyeobji anhneunyo

23|33|hyeonseeseo hananim-ui eunhyeleul bad-eun geu baegseong-ui jogjangdeul-eun mid-eum-eul bulsinhago naese-ui sangbong-eul bujeonghamyeo malhagil i salam-eun neohuiwa machanga jilo han ingan-e bulgwahani neohuiga meogneun geoscheoleom geudo meoggo neohuiga ma sineun geoscheoleom geudo masineun ingan-il ppun-ila
23|34|man-il neohuiwa daleulba eobsneun han ingan-ege bogjonghandamyeon neohuineun bunmyeong ilh-eunjadeul-i doelila hadeola
23|35|neohuiga jug-eo heulg-idoego ppyeoman nam-eul ttae neohuiga dasi sosaenghal geos-ila geuga yagsoghayeossdeonyo
23|37|sillo hyeonse-ui salm oeeneun amuleon saengmyeong-i eobsnola uliga jug-eo dasi sal-a buhwalhandaneun geos-eun bulganeung han il-ila
23|38|sillo geuneun hananim-e daehayeo geojishaneun han sanaee bulgwahageoneul ulineun geuleul mid-eul su eobsdoda
23|39|ittae yeeonjakkeseo juyeo jeoleul dowajusoseo geudeul-eun jeoleul bujeonghanaida lago giwonhanani
23|41|geuhu geudeul-ege jeogjeolhan beol-i naelyeojyeoss-euni hananim-eun geudeul-eul jug-eunnag-yeob-eulo mandeul-eo geu joejieun jadeul eul myeolmangke haessnola
23|42|geuleon da-eum hananim-eun geudeul ihuui daleun sedaeleul sewossnola
